Question.Subject: In Amazon.com do I Have to pay shipping and handling no matter what?
Question.Content:
cause i bought a ipod case and i dont know if i have to pay shipping and handling...cause i want to buy a game and im not sure if i have to pay... Item(s) Subtotal: $2.22 Shipping & Handling: $0.00
So does this mean that it doesnt cost anything
Question.ChosenAnswer: Depends if it is directly from Amazon or another seller. It is always clearly marked. If it is from Amazon and is over $25, it is free shipping.

Answer.Content: Depends if it is directly from Amazon or another seller. It is always clearly marked. If it is from Amazon and is over $25, it is free shipping.
